name: Puzzle Sphere
desc: While it can be seen as an item to boost combat performance, it is also a uniquely shaped puzzle. The inspiration behind this W-Engine is said to have come from the designer's childhood, when a similar puzzle his mother made by hand helped him get through tired mornings and dreary afternoons. He poured his deep longing for his mother into the W-Engine and this longing brings the user a sense of comfort: holding the sphere is like returning to a childhood where, after a nightmare, you'd run to your mother's side for protection.
desc2: Equip to increase Rupture Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: The W-Engine, with its bright colors and great performance, saw poor sales at first because it resembled a toy. But with its reasonable price, it slowly gained a positive reputation.
